text: Quiet Days in August (, translit. Isyhes meres tou Avgoustou) is a 1991 Greek drama film directed by Pantelis Voulgaris. It was entered into the 41st Berlin International Film Festival. ==Cast== * Aleka Paizi as Aleka * Themis Bazaka as Elli * Thanasis Veggos as Nikolas * Chryssoula Diavati as Maria * Alekos Oudinotis as Lefteris * Eirini Inglesi as Eirini * Mirka Kalatzopoulou as Vaso * Nina Papazaphiropoulou * Eirini Koumarianou * Stavros Kalaroglou * Tonia Stavropoulou * Aglaia Pappa ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 films Category:Greek films Category:Greek-language films Category:1991 drama films Category:Films directed by Pantelis Voulgaris Category:Films scored by Manos Hatzidakis
title: Quiet Days in August
